Story: On April 29, 1919, a week long workers' strike started at Stucky. The strike was sucessful, resulting in salary improvements and an 8-hour work day.

The Junghans basketball team was established, which dominated the minor league touraments. This was an after-work team made up of Junghans workers. The women workers were also included in the after-work activities, establishing them their own basketball team, Libertas.
